name: Demon Wars
overview: A game very much like the Stratego board game where you arrange your different characters on the board, each with special types of attacks and take on an opponent who has done the same. The intent is to find the Stone of Power hidden amongst your opponent's pieces before they find yours. Once upon a time in a far-off world of gods full of magic and dangers in the year 321 after Parton... “That’s enough!” fumed Tenom, the Father of the Gods. “This damned vermin has finally gone too far. We've had no peace since the death of Parton. The war between the kingdoms of Viaroid and Picom has now been going on for 320 years. The rulers have been begging me to bring them victory over the enemy ever since this time.” On the same day, Tenom summoned the rulers to him and said: “The decisive battle for the two kingdoms is to take place on a small unimportant island. Each kingdom can send its best warriors, magicians, beasts and demons, 30 in all, to fight the battle for glory, honour and ultimately a united kingdom. The battle is won when the stone of power is torn from the enemy king. Now it’s up to you to bravely and skilfully lead your armies to victory. May the best man win...”
